about_the_game:
Devin Night TP122: Wasteland Warriors 1

TP122 Warriors of the Wasteland 1, This pack contains 39 hand-drawn and colored tokens of survivors or space-faring characters and their pets. This pack contains only female characters.
This product contains:
  • Dog Armored Large
  • 2 Dog Armored Sheperd
  • 5 Dog Shepherd
  • 3 Female BC
  • 3 Female BC Armor Helm
  • Female BC Armor Sit Helm
  • 3 Female BC Armored
  • Female BC Armored Sit
  • 3 Female BC Red
  • 2 Female BC Sit
  • 3 Female BC Vest
  • Female BC Armored MG Helm
  • Female BC Armored MG
  • 2 Female Human Melody
  • 2 Female Human Shooter
  • 6 Female Human Tanith
Converted by:   James Holloway

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
